name: mcp-adr-analysis-server-docs
description: Documentation website for MCP ADR Analysis Server

scripts.setup: echo '🚀 Setting up documentation website...' && npm install && echo '✅ Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start'
scripts.dev: echo '🌐 Starting development server...' && vitepress dev
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building for production...' && vitepress build && echo '✅ Build complete!'
scripts.deploy: echo '🚀 Building and deploying...' && npm run build && echo '📡 Push to main branch to deploy via GitHub Actions'
scripts.clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning build artifacts...' && rm -rf .vitepress/dist .vitepress/cache && echo '✅ Cleanup complete!'
